Author: ManicPixieBallerina
Text: Right? It feels like the minimum to not feel shame is rising. I didn't hate half the things I hate now last year. And I didn't now some of the things I hate could be fixed.

Author: linedryonly
Text: This is so relatable. After moving to Korea, I found a whole new set of standards to apply to my face and body. There are things I hate about my appearance now that I never could have even imagined before.
